description: Divina Papaya is a women-led social bio-enterprise focused on creating dehydrated foods from plants and edible flowers. Committed to holistic health, the initiative promotes regenerative agroecological practices that benefit both consumers and the land. Collaborating with organizations like the World Food Programme, Divina Papaya aims to strengthen agroecological supply chains and foster food sustainability, while also advocating for the conservation of biodiversity and the empowerment of local communities in Ecuador.
name: Divina Papaya
